title: TRT World
summary: TRT World is a Turkish state owned international news channel which broadcasts in English 24 hours a day, operated by the Turkish Radio and Television Corporation (TRT) and is based in Istanbul. It provides worldwide news and current affairs focusing on Turkey, Europe, Africa, Western and Southern Asia.[1] In addition to its Istanbul headquarters, TRT World has broadcasting centres and studios in Washington D.C., London, and Singapore. It is a member of the Association for International Broadcasting.
